description.value:
This armor's magic lets you store an abundance of gear, even as it generates a defensive field in response to attack.

Armor: Leather

Enhancement Bonus: AC

Property:

The many pockets of this armor can hold up to 2,000 pounds in weight or 200 cubic feet in volume, but items stored in the armor add only 1 pound to its weight. Each item stored within one of the armor's pockets can weigh no more than 20 pounds. Drawing an item from a tinkersuit is a minor action.

Power âœ¦ Encounter (Immediate Interrupt)

Trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee or a ranged attack.

Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
